item.title: About Me
item.description:
[root /]$ About Me:

Hello there! This is Pei. My hometown is Taiwan and I moved to Germany in 2015. I used to work at QuestDB (time series database), Jina AI (neural search framework), and many other companies in different roles.

[root /]$ What I do:

Product management, product marketing, developer relations, and business development. In other words, problem solving, bridging cross-team communication and delivering user oriented results.

[root /]$ What else I do:

I’m passionate about technology, open-source software, and user-centric products. Besides my current occupation, I’m currently learning Python programming.
